text: @realDonaldTrump Fuck off you fat bastard with your lies about the Coronavirus. You alone hate America and gutted the CDC because you're jealous of @BarackObama. You did not create the virus, but you are responsible for helping to spread it, you inept (means stupid, dummy) piece of shit loser.
